text: Chase Cabre (born February 7, 1997) is an American professional stock car racing driver. He competes full-time in the NASCAR K&N; Pro Series East, driving the No. 4 Toyota Camry for Rev Racing. Cabre started his racing career in motocross and later moved to micro-sprints while balancing a soccer career in his formative years. At the end of his four-year tenure with Rev in the developmental stock car ranks, Cabre elected not to chase further stock car opportunities via a pay route and instead chose to return to dirt racing.
